name: festive-post
description: This is a fully client-side web application that allows users to create festive posts for their businesses. Users can upload their logo, enter their company name, select a brand color, and choose from a variety of festive templates to generate a social media-ready post.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:js: terser script.js -o dist/script.js -c -m && terser js/downloadHandler.js -o dist/js/downloadHandler.js -c -m && terser js/imageControls.js -o dist/js/imageControls.js -c -m && terser js/saveLoadHandler.js -o dist/js/saveLoadHandler.js -c -m && terser js/templateHandler.js -o dist/js/templateHandler.js -c -m && terser js/textControls.js -o dist/js/textControls.js -c -m
